name: ITX 219.01.E - SDL - Monthly Return
query:
SELECT	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Basic pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Basic pay:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Leave pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Leave pay:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Sick pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Sick pay:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Payment in Lieu of Leave', sd.amount, 0)) as "Payment in Lieu of Leave:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Fees', sd.amount, 0)) as "Fees:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Commission', sd.amount, 0)) as "Commission:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Bonus', sd.amount, 0)) as "Bonus:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Gratuity', sd.amount, 0)) as "Gratuity:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Subsistence Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Subsistence Allowance:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Traveling Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Traveling Allowance:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Entertainment Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Entertainment Allowance:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Housing Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Housing Allowance:Currency:",
	sum(if(sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Any Other Allowances', sd.amount, 0)) as "Any Other Allowances:Currency:",
	sum(if(sd.salary_component = 'SDL', sd.amount, 0)) as "SDL:Currency:",
	ss.company as "Company:Data:0",
	cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0",
	cmp.email as "Email:Data:0",
	cmp.phone_no as "Phone:Data:0",
	cmp.fax as "Fax Number:Data:0",
	cmp.p_o_box as "P O Box:Data:0",
	cmp.street as "Street:Data:0",
	cmp.plot_number as "Plot Number:Data:0",
	cmp.block_number as "Block Number:Data:0",
	cmp.city as "City:Data:0",
	DATE_FORMAT(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') as "Month:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd	ON sd.parent = ss.name 
			  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp 	ON ss.company = cmp.name 
			  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Component` sc ON sd.salary_component = sc.name
WHERE	ss.start_date = %(from_date)s
AND	ss.end_date = %(to_date)s
AND	ss.docstatus = '1'
